messages.title: MATT EDWARDS: HERE ALL YEAR, NOT JUST AT ELECTION TIME
messages.content: Matt Edwards has reported a damaged wall to Bradford Council again. 'SEVEN MONTHS TO FIX A WALL?' - The wall on Knowles Lane in Holmewood was first reported by Matt in April. Most fixes shouldn't really be this tough. If it does happen that parts of Bradford would be fixed faster than others.

messages.title: GREENS MAKE GREEN BELT PLEDGE
messages.content: Green leader Natalie Bennett visited Bradford South to make a 'pledge to protect our green belt.' Matt says: 'This is a chance for voters to tell local estates that are not happy with the way Bradford Council has managed green spaces for housing. Yes, we need more homes but there are plenty of empty ones around where taxes can go today.'

messages.title: VOTE MATT EDWARDS FOR YOUR MP
messages.content: We need an MP who will stand up for Bradford. Tong Ward campaigner Matt Edwards has been selected by the Green Party to stand in this General Election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Restoring our NHS - More money for our schools + Invest in youth services and lifesaving childbirth income for pensioners
Fairer taxes - Replace council tax and business rates with a new system to generate fair TV attention
Improve insulation of every UK home by 2030 + Protect our green belt + Invest in public transport + Ban fracking

mentions.tacticalSituation: On 12th December – you can send a message to Labour and to the Conservatives that have to change here in Bradford – vote Green.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am standing in this election because Bradford deserves better – especially places like Tong Ward. We have been taken for granted by Labour and it is time for change. If you want fresh thinking and new ideas for our area, then vote for me on 12th December – Matt Edwards
